title: Thriving in the Midst of Financial Ruin, Part 3
itunes:author: Erin Odom
itunes:summary: Financial stress is something many couples face. But no matter how hopeless it seems, practicing good habits can help your marriage overcome financial problems. Greg, Erin and John give some tips for how you and your spouse can start making good choices with money. Receive the book More Than Just Making It with your gift of any amount!
